channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wikipedia’s Existential Threats Feel Greater Than Ever
item.description: As the free online encyclopedia turns 25, it’s facing political opposition, AI scraping, dwindling volunteers, and a public that may no longer believe...

item.title: Two Thinking Machines Lab Cofounders Are Leaving to Rejoin OpenAI
item.description: The departures are a blow for Thinking Machines Lab. Two narratives are already emerging about why they happened.

item.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
item.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.

item.title: The FTC’s data-sharing order against GM is finally settled
item.description: The order, first proposed a year ago, bans GM from collecting and then selling geolocation data to third parties, like data brokers and insurance comp...

item.title: Our Favorite Coway Air Purifiers Are on Sale (2026)
item.description: Breathe easier with these discounts on one of WIRED’s favorite air purifier brands, including an option for large rooms.

item.title: Microsoft taps India’s Varaha for durable carbon removal offtake
item.description: Microsoft is buying over 100,000 tons of carbon dioxide removal credits from India's Varaha over the next three years.

item.title: Lizn Hearpieces Review: Affordable but Uncomfortable Hearing Aids
item.description: These odd-looking hearing aids double as solid earbuds, but comfort is a major issue.

item.title: India’s Emversity doubles valuation as it scales workers AI can’t replace
item.description: Emversity has raised $30 million in a new round as it scales job-ready training in India.

item.title: Tech Workers Are Condemning ICE Even as Their CEOs Stay Quiet
item.description: The killing of George Floyd in 2020 prompted a wave of statements from tech companies and CEOs. Today, pushback against ICE is largely coming from emp...

item.title: Musk denies awareness of Grok sexual underage images as California AG launches probe
item.description: The California attorney general has opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's xAI after its chatbot Grok began generating nonconsensual sexual im...
